substance_abuse.Subject: Alcohol
substance_abuse.General/Patient Text:
%u2022Have 10 or less drinks a week if you are a woman
%u2022Have 15 or less drinks per week if you are a man

A standard drink is :
12 ounces of 5% alcohol beer or
 5 ounces of 7-10% alcohol wine or
 1.5 ounces of 40% alcohol liquor
A standard drink contains 13.6 grams of alcohol.

sun_exposure.Subject: Stop skin cancer
sun_exposure.General/Patient Text:
%u2022Wear protective clothing
%u2022Limit time in the sun (worst time: between 10 am and 3 pm) 
%u2022Wear sunscreen (minimum SPF 30) : recommended
